054public class SQLQueryVisitorTest {
055
056  private static final OccurrenceSearchParameter PARAM = OccurrenceSearchParameter.CATALOG_NUMBER;
057  private static final OccurrenceSearchParameter PARAM2 =
058      OccurrenceSearchParameter.INSTITUTION_CODE;
059
060  private final SQLQueryVisitor visitor =
061      new SQLQueryVisitor(new OccurrenceTermsMapper(), "defaultChecklistKey");
062
063  @Test
064  public void testComplexQuery() throws QueryBuildingException {
065    Predicate aves = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "212", false);
066    Predicate passer =
067        new LikePredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.SCIENTIFIC_NAME, "Passer*", false);
068    Predicate UK = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COUNTRY, "GB", false);
069    Predicate before1989 = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, "1989");
070    Predicate georeferencedPredicate =
071        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.HAS_COORDINATE, "true", false);
072
073    ConjunctionPredicate p =
074        new ConjunctionPredicate(List.of(aves, UK, passer, before1989, georeferencedPredicate));
075    String where = visitor.buildQuery(p);
076    assertEquals(
077        "(((stringArrayContains(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], '212', true))) AND (countrycode = 'GB') AND (lower(scientificname) LIKE lower('Passer%')) AND (year <= 1989) AND (hascoordinate = true))",
078        where);
079  }
080
081  @Test
082  public void testMoreComplexQuery() throws QueryBuildingException {
083    Predicate taxon1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "1", false);
084    Predicate taxon2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "2", false);
085    DisjunctionPredicate taxa = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(taxon1, taxon2));
086
087    Predicate basis =
088        new InPredicate<>(
089            OccurrenceSearchParameter.BASIS_OF_RECORD,
090            List.of("HUMAN_OBSERVATION", "MACHINE_OBSERVATION"),
091            false);
092
093    Predicate UK = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COUNTRY, "GB", false);
094    Predicate IE = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COUNTRY, "IE", false);
095    DisjunctionPredicate countries = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(UK, IE));
096
097    Predicate before1989 = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, "1989");
098    Predicate in2000 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, "2000", false);
099    DisjunctionPredicate years = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(before1989, in2000));
100
101    ConjunctionPredicate p = new ConjunctionPredicate(List.of(taxa, basis, countries, years));
102    String where = visitor.buildQuery(p);
103    assertEquals(
104        "(((arrays_overlap(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], array('2','1')))) "
105            + "AND ((basisofrecord IN('HUMAN_OBSERVATION', 'MACHINE_OBSERVATION'))) "
106            + "AND ((countrycode IN(\'GB\', \'IE\'))) "
107            + "AND (((year <= 1989) OR (year = 2000))))",
108        where);
109  }
110
111  @Test
112  public void testConjunctionPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
113    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", false);
114    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM2, "value_2", false);
115
116    ConjunctionPredicate p = new ConjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
117    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
118    assertEquals(
119        "((lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value_1\')) AND (lower(institutioncode) = lower(\'value_2\')))",
120        query);
121  }
122
123  @Test
124  public void testDisjunctionPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
125    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", false);
126    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM2, "value_2", false);
127
128    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
129    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
130    assertEquals(
131        "((lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value_1\')) OR (lower(institutioncode) = lower(\'value_2\')))",
132        query);
133  }
134
135  @Test
136  public void testDisjunctionToInPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
137    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", false);
138    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_2", false);
139
140    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
141    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
142    assertEquals("(lower(catalognumber) IN(lower(\'value_1\'), lower(\'value_2\')))", query);
143  }

145  @Test
146  public void testDisjunctionToInTaxonPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
147    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "1", false);
148    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "2", false);
149
150    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
151    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
152    assertEquals("(arrays_overlap(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], array('2','1')))", query);
153  }
154
155  @Test
156  public void testDisjunctionToInGadmGidPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
157    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID, "IRL_1", false);
158    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID, "GBR.2_1", false);
159
160    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
161    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
162    assertEquals(
163        "(level0gid IN('IRL_1', 'GBR.2_1') OR level1gid IN('IRL_1', 'GBR.2_1') OR level2gid IN('IRL_1', 'GBR.2_1') OR level3gid IN('IRL_1', 'GBR.2_1'))",
164        query);
165  }
166
167  @Test
168  public void testDisjunctionMediaTypePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
169    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.MEDIA_TYPE, "StillImage", false);
170    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.MEDIA_TYPE, "Sound", false);
171
172    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
173    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
174    assertEquals(
175        "(stringArrayContains(mediatype,'StillImage',true) OR stringArrayContains(mediatype,'Sound',true))",
176        query);
177  }
178
179  @Test
180  public void testDisjunctionVerbatimToInPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
181    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", true);
182    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_2", true);
183
184    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
185    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
186    assertEquals("(catalognumber IN('value_1', 'value_2'))", query);
187
188    Predicate p3 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_3", false);
189
190    p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2, p3));
191    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
192    assertEquals(
193        "((catalognumber = 'value_1') OR (catalognumber = 'value_2') OR (lower(catalognumber) = lower('value_3')))",
194        query);
195  }

197  @Test
198  public void testEqualsPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
199    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value", false);
200    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
201    assertEquals("lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value\')", query);
202  }
203
204  @Test
205  public void testEqualsPredicateGadmGid() throws QueryBuildingException {
206    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID, "IRL_1", false);
207
208    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
209    assertEquals(
210        "(level0gid = 'IRL_1' OR level1gid = 'IRL_1' OR level2gid = 'IRL_1' OR level3gid = 'IRL_1')",
211        query);
212  }
213
214  @Test
215  public void testLikePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
216    // NB: ? and * are wildcards (translated to SQL _ and %), so literal _ and % are escaped.
217    Predicate p = new LikePredicate<>(PARAM, "v?l*ue_%", false);
218    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
219    assertEquals("lower(catalognumber) LIKE lower(\'v_l%ue\\_\\%\')", query);
220  }
221
222  @Test
223  public void testLikeVerbatimPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
224    Predicate p = new LikePredicate<>(PARAM, "v?l*ue_%", true);
225    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
226    assertEquals("catalognumber LIKE \'v_l%ue\\_\\%\'", query);
227  }
228
229  @Test
230  public void testEqualsVerbatimPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
231    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value", true);
232    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
233    assertEquals("catalognumber = \'value\'", query);
234  }
235
236  @Test
237  public void testEqualsArrayPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
238    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "value", false);
239    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
240    assertEquals("stringArrayContains(recordedby,'value',false)", query);
241
242    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "value", true);
243    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
244    assertEquals("stringArrayContains(recordedby,'value',true)", query);
245  }
246
247  @Test
248  public void testLikeArrayPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
249    // NB: ? and * are the wildcards here.
250    Predicate p = new LikePredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "v?l*ue_%", false);
251    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
252    assertEquals("stringArrayLike(recordedby,'v?l*ue_%',false)", query);
253
254    p = new LikePredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "v?l*ue_%", true);
255    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
256    assertEquals("stringArrayLike(recordedby,'v?l*ue_%',true)", query);
257  }

331  @Test
332  public void testNotPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
333    Predicate p = new NotPredicate(new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value", false));
334    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
335    assertEquals("NOT lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value\')", query);
336  }
337
338  @Test
339  public void testNotPredicateComplex() throws QueryBuildingException {
340    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", false);
341    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM2, "value_2", false);
342
343    ConjunctionPredicate cp = new ConjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
344
345    Predicate p = new NotPredicate(cp);
346    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
347    assertEquals(
348        "NOT ((lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value_1\')) AND (lower(institutioncode) = lower(\'value_2\')))",
349        query);
350  }
351
352  @Test
353  public void testQuotes() throws QueryBuildingException {
354    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "my \'pleasure\'", false);
355    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
356    assertEquals("lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'my \\\'pleasure\\\'\')", query);
357
358    Predicate predicateRecordedBY =
359        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "Brian J O'Shea", false);
360    String queryRecordedBy = visitor.buildQuery(predicateRecordedBY);
361    assertEquals("stringArrayContains(recordedby,'Brian J O\\'Shea',false)", queryRecordedBy);
362
363    p = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ELEVATION, "101");
364    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
365    assertEquals("elevation <= 101", query);
366
367    p = new GreaterThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, "1998");
368    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
369    assertEquals("year > 1998", query);
370  }

372  @Test
373  public void testGeoDistancePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
374    Predicate p = new GeoDistancePredicate("30", "10", "10km");
375    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
376    assertEquals(
377        "(geoDistance(30.0, 10.0, '10.0km', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)", query);
378  }
379
380  @Test
381  public void testWithinPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
382    final String wkt = "POLYGON ((30 10, 10 20, 20 40, 40 40, 30 10))";
383    Predicate p = new WithinPredicate(wkt);
384    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
385    assertEquals("(contains('" + wkt + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)", query);
386  }
387
388  @Test
389  public void testLongerWithinPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
390    final String wkt =
391        "POLYGON ((-21.4671921 65.441761, -21.3157028 65.9990267, -22.46732 66.4657148, -23.196803 66.3490242, -22.362113 66.2703732, -22.9758561 66.228119, -22.3831844 66.0933255, -22.424131 65.8374539, -23.4703372 66.1972321, -23.2565264 65.6767322, -24.5319933 65.5027259, -21.684764 65.4547893, -24.0482947 64.8794291, -21.3551366 64.3842337, -22.7053151 63.8001572, -19.1269971 63.3980322, -13.4948065 65.076438, -15.1872897 66.1073781, -14.5302343 66.3783121, -16.0235596 66.5371808, -21.4671921 65.441761))";
392    Predicate p = new WithinPredicate(wkt);
393    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
394    assertEquals(
395        "((decimallatitude >= 63.3980322 AND decimallatitude <= 66.5371808 AND (decimallongitude >= -24.5319933 AND decimallongitude <= -13.4948065)) AND contains('"
396            + wkt
397            + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
398        query);
399  }

401  @Test
402  public void testAntimeridianWithinPredicate() throws Exception {
403    // A rectangle over the Bering sea, shouldn't have any bounding box added
404    String wkt =
405        "POLYGON((-206.71875 39.20502, -133.59375 39.20502, -133.59375 77.26611, -206.71875 77.26611, -206.71875 39.20502))";
406    String query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wkt));
407    assertEquals("(contains('" + wkt + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)", query);
408  }
409
410  @Test
411  public void testAddedBoundingBoxes() throws Exception {
412    String query;
413
414    // A multipolygon around Taveuni, split over the antimeridian
415    String wktM =
416        "MULTIPOLYGON (((180 -16.658979090909092, 180 -17.12485513597339, 179.87915 -17.12058, 179.78577 -16.82899, 179.85168 -16.72643, 180 -16.658979090909092)), ((-180 -17.12485513597339, -180 -16.658979090909092, -179.8764 -16.60277, -179.75006 -16.86054, -179.89838 -17.12845, -180 -17.12485513597339)))";
417    String bbox =
418        "(decimallatitude >= -17.12845 AND decimallatitude <= -16.60277 AND (decimallongitude >= 179.78577 OR decimallongitude <= -179.75006))";
419    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktM));
420    assertEquals(
421        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
422        query);
423
424    // A polygon around Taveuni, Fiji, as portal16 produces it.
425    // Note the result still contains the multipolygon.
426    String wkt16 =
427        "POLYGON((-180.14832 -16.72643, -180.21423 -16.82899, -180.12085 -17.12058, -179.89838 -17.12845, -179.75006 -16.86054, -179.8764 -16.60277, -180.14832 -16.72643))";
428    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wkt16));
429    assertEquals(
430        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
431        query);
432
433    // Same place, but as Wicket draws it:
434    // Note the result still contains the same multipolygon.
435    String wktWk =
436        "POLYGON((179.85168 -16.72643, 179.78577 -16.82899, 179.87915 -17.12058, -179.89838 -17.12845, -179.75006 -16.86054, -179.8764 -16.60277, 179.85168 -16.72643))";
437    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktWk));
438    assertEquals(
439        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
440        query);
441
442    // Tiny areas scattered around the world, all in a single multipolygon.
443    // Requires bounding boxes to avoid very slow Hive performance.
444    String wktMM =
445        "MULTIPOLYGON (((-109.42861 -27.13333, -109.42861 -27.13666, -109.43138 -27.13666, -109.43138 -27.13333, -109.42861 -27.13333)), "
446            + "((-109.42236 -27.10919, -109.42236 -27.11191, -109.42541 -27.11191, -109.42541 -27.10919, -109.42236 -27.10919)), "
447            + "((-174.35146 -19.80528, -174.35146 -19.81829, -174.36338 -19.81829, -174.36338 -19.80528, -174.35146 -19.80528)), "
448            + "((-173.94525 -18.71444, -173.96472 -18.71444, -173.96472 -18.68694, -173.94525 -18.68694, -173.94525 -18.71444)), "
449            + "((-173.91655 -18.66372, -173.94041 -18.66372, -173.94041 -18.63616, -173.91655 -18.63616, -173.91655 -18.66372)))";
450    String bboxMM =
451        "(decimallatitude >= -27.13666 AND decimallatitude <= -18.63616 AND (decimallongitude >= -174.36338 AND decimallongitude <= -109.42236)) AND "
452            + "(((decimallatitude >= -27.13666 AND decimallatitude <= -27.13333 AND (decimallongitude >= -109.43138 AND decimallongitude <= -109.42861)) OR "
453            + "(decimallatitude >= -27.11191 AND decimallatitude <= -27.10919 AND (decimallongitude >= -109.42541 AND decimallongitude <= -109.42236)) OR "
454            + "(decimallatitude >= -19.81829 AND decimallatitude <= -19.80528 AND (decimallongitude >= -174.36338 AND decimallongitude <= -174.35146)) OR "
455            + "(decimallatitude >= -18.71444 AND decimallatitude <= -18.68694 AND (decimallongitude >= -173.96472 AND decimallongitude <= -173.94525)) OR "
456            + "(decimallatitude >= -18.66372 AND decimallatitude <= -18.63616 AND (decimallongitude >= -173.94041 AND decimallongitude <= -173.91655))))";
457    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktMM));
458    assertEquals(
459        "(" + bboxMM + " AND contains('" + wktMM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
460        query);
461  }
462
463  @Test
464  public void testWidePolygons() throws Exception {
465    String query;
466
467    // A polygon around Antarctica
468    String wktP =
469        "POLYGON ((180 -64.7, 180 -56.8, 180 -44.3, 173 -44.3, 173 -47.5, 170 -47.5, 157 -47.5, 157 -45.9, 150 -45.9, 150 -47.5, 143 -47.5, 143 -45.8, 140 -45.8, 140 -44.5, 137 -44.5, 137 -43, 135 -43, 135 -41.7, 131 -41.7, 131 -40.1, 115 -40.1, 92 -40.1, 92 -41.4, 78 -41.4, 78 -42.3, 69 -42.3, 69 -43.3, 47 -43.3, 47 -41.7, 30 -41.7, 12 -41.7, 12 -40.3, 10 -40.3, 10 -38.3, -5 -38.3, -5 -38.9, -9 -38.9, -9 -40.2, -13 -40.2, -13 -41.4, -21 -41.4, -21 -42.5, -39 -42.5, -39 -40.7, -49 -40.7, -49 -48.6, -54 -48.6, -54 -55.7, -62.79726 -55.7, -64 -55.7, -64 -57.8, -71 -57.8, -71 -58.9, -80 -58.9, -80 -40, -103.71094 -40.14844, -125 -40, -167 -40, -167 -42.6, -171 -42.6, -171 -44.3, -180 -44.3, -180 -56.8, -180 -64.7, -180 -80, -125 -80, -70 -80, 30 -80, 115 -80, 158 -80, 180 -80, 180 -64.7))";
470    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktP));
471    assertEquals(
472        "((decimallatitude >= -80.0 AND decimallatitude <= -38.3 AND (decimallongitude >= -180.0 AND decimallongitude <= 180.0)) AND contains('"
473            + wktP
474            + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
475        query);
476
477    // A multipolygon around the Pacific and Indian oceans, split over the antimeridian
478    String wktM =
479        "MULTIPOLYGON (((180 51.83076923076923, 180 -63, 35 -63, 60 -9, 127 1, 157 49, 180 51.83076923076923)), ((-180 -63, -180 51.83076923076923, -138 57, -127 39, -112 18, -92 13, -84 1, -77 -63, -169 -63, -180 -63)))";
480    String bbox =
481        "(decimallatitude >= -63.0 AND decimallatitude <= 57.0 AND (decimallongitude >= 35.0 OR decimallongitude <= -77.0))";
482    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktM));
483    assertEquals(
484        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
485        query);
486
487    // The same polygon, as portal16 produces it.
488    // Note the result still contains the multipolygon.
489    String wkt16 =
490        "POLYGON((35.0 -63.0, 191.0 -63.0, 283.0 -63.0, 276.0 1.0, 268.0 13.0, 248.0 18.0, 233.0 39.0, 222.0 57.0, 157.0 49.0, 127.0 1.0, 60.0 -9.0, 35.0 -63.0))";
491    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wkt16));
492    assertEquals(
493        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
494        query);
495
496    // A polygon around the Pacific, as Wicket draws it:
497    String wktWk =
498        "POLYGON((157.0 49.0,127.0 1.0,60.0 -9.0,35.0 -63.0,-169.0 -63.0,-77.0 -63.0,-84.0 1.0,-92.0 13.0,-112.0 18.0,-127.0 39.0,-138.0 57.0,157.0 49.0))";
499    assertEquals(
500        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
501        query);
502  }

593  @Test
594  public void testPartialDates() throws QueryBuildingException {
595    testPartialDate("2021-10-25T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-26T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-25");
596    testPartialDate("2014-10-01T00:00:00Z", "2014-11-01T00:00:00Z", "2014-10");
597    testPartialDate("1936-01-01T00:00:00Z", "1937-01-01T00:00:00Z", "1936");
598  }

600  @Test
601  public void testDateRanges() throws QueryBuildingException {
602    testPartialDate("2021-10-25T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-26T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-25,2021-10-25");
603    testPartialDate("2021-10-25T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-27T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-25,2021-10-26");
604    testPartialDate("2014-05-01T00:00:00Z", "2014-07-01T00:00:00Z", "2014-05,2014-06");
605    testPartialDate("1936-01-01T00:00:00Z", "1941-01-01T00:00:00Z", "1936,1940");
606    testPartialDate("1940-01-01T00:00:00Z", null, "1940,*");
607    testPartialDate(null, "1941-01-01T00:00:00Z", "*,1940");
608    testPartialDate(null, null, "*,*");
609  }
610
611  @Test
612  public void testDateComparisons() throws QueryBuildingException {
613    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000", false);
614    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
615    assertEquals(
616        String.format(
617            "(lastinterpreted >= %s AND lastinterpreted < %s)",
618            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli(),
619            Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
620        query);
621
622    // Include the range
623    p = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000");
624    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
625    assertEquals(
626        String.format("lastinterpreted < %s", Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
627        query);
628
629    p = new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000");
630    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
631    assertEquals(
632        String.format(
633            "lastinterpreted >= %s", Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
634        query);
635
636    // Exclude the range
637    p = new LessThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000");
638    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
639    assertEquals(
640        String.format("lastinterpreted < %s", Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
641        query);
642
643    p = new GreaterThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000");
644    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
645    assertEquals(
646        String.format(
647            "lastinterpreted >= %s", Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
648        query);
649  }
650
651  @Test
652  public void testDateRangeComparisons() throws QueryBuildingException {
653    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01-02", false);
654    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
655    assertEquals(
656        String.format(
657            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
658            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
659            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
660        query);
661
662    p = new InPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, Arrays.asList("2000-01-02"), false);
663    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
664    assertEquals(
665        String.format(
666            "((eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s))",
667            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
668            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
669        query);
670
671    p =
672        new InPredicate<>(
673            OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, Arrays.asList("2000-01-02", "2024-01-17"), false);
674    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
675    assertEquals(
676        String.format(
677            "((eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s) OR (eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s))",
678            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
679            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
680            Instant.parse("2024-01-17T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
681            Instant.parse("2024-01-18T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
682        query);
683
684    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01-02,2000-01-04", false);
685    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
686    assertEquals(
687        String.format(
688            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
689            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
690            Instant.parse("2000-01-05T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
691        query);
692
693    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01", false);
694    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
695    assertEquals(
696        String.format(
697            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
698            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
699            Instant.parse("2000-02-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
700        query);
701
702    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01,2000-03", false);
703    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
704    assertEquals(
705        String.format(
706            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
707            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
708            Instant.parse("2000-04-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
709        query);
710
711    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000", false);
712    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
713    assertEquals(
714        String.format(
715            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
716            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
717            Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
718        query);
719
720    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000,2001", false);
721    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
722    assertEquals(
723        String.format(
724            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
725            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
726            Instant.parse("2002-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
727        query);
728
729    // Include the range (for the or-equal-to)
730    p = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000");
731    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
732    assertEquals(
733        String.format("eventdategte < %s", Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
734        query);
735
736    p = new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000");
737    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
738    assertEquals(
739        String.format("eventdatelte >= %s", Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
740        query);
741
742    // Exclude the range
743    p = new LessThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000");
744    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
745    assertEquals(
746        String.format("eventdategte < %s", Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
747        query);
748
749    p = new GreaterThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000");
750    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
751    assertEquals(
752        String.format("eventdatelte >= %s", Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
753        query);
754  }
755
756  /** Reusable method to test partial dates, i.e., dates with the format: yyyy, yyyy-MM. */
757  private void testPartialDate(String expectedFrom, String expectedTo, String value)
758      throws QueryBuildingException {
759    Range<Instant> range =
760        Range.closed(
761            expectedFrom == null ? null : Instant.parse(expectedFrom),
762            expectedTo == null ? null : Instant.parse(expectedTo));
763
764    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, value, false);
765    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
766
767    if (!range.hasUpperBound() && !range.hasLowerBound()) {
768      assertEquals("", query);
769    } else if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
770      assertEquals(
771          String.format("(lastinterpreted >= %s)", range.lowerEndpoint().toEpochMilli()), query);
772    } else if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
773      assertEquals(
774          String.format("(lastinterpreted < %s)", range.upperEndpoint().toEpochMilli()), query);
775    } else {
776      assertEquals(
777          String.format(
778              "(lastinterpreted >= %s AND lastinterpreted < %s)",
779              range.lowerEndpoint().toEpochMilli(), range.upperEndpoint().toEpochMilli()),
780          query);
781    }
782  }
783
784  /** Some dates in HDFS are a number of seconds, others a number of milliseconds. */
785  @Test
786  public void testDateMagnitude() throws QueryBuildingException {
787    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01-02", false);
788    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
789    assertEquals(
790        String.format(
791            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
792            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
793            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
794        query);
795
796    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000-01-02", false);
797    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
798    assertEquals(
799        String.format(
800            "(lastinterpreted >= %s AND lastinterpreted < %s)",
801            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli(),
802            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
803        query);
804
805    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.MODIFIED, "2000-01-02", false);
806    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
807    assertEquals(
808        String.format(
809            "(modified >= %s AND modified < %s)",
810            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
811            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
812        query);
813  }

815  @Test
816  public void testIntRanges() throws QueryBuildingException {
817
818    String value = "1990,2011";
819    Range<Integer> range = SearchTypeValidator.parseIntegerRange(value);
820
821    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, value, false);
822    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
823
824    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
825      assertEquals(String.format("year >= %s", range.lowerEndpoint().intValue()), query);
826    } else if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
827      assertEquals(String.format("year <= %s", range.upperEndpoint().intValue()), query);
828    } else {
829      assertEquals(
830          String.format(
831              "((year >= %s) AND (year <= %s))",
832              range.lowerEndpoint().intValue(), range.upperEndpoint().intValue()),
833          query);
834    }
835  }
836
837  @Test
838  public void testIntInclusiveRangeWithRangePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
839
840    RangeValue rangeValue = new RangeValue("1990", null, "2011", null);
841    Predicate p = new RangePredicate(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, rangeValue);
842    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
843    assertEquals(
844        String.format(
845            "((year >= %1$s) AND (year <= %2$s))",
846            Integer.parseInt(rangeValue.getGte()), Integer.parseInt(rangeValue.getLte())),
847        query);
848  }

857        String.format(
858            "((year > %1$s) AND (year < %2$s))",

860        query);

896  /** Reusable method to test number ranges. */
897  private void testDoubleRange(String value) throws QueryBuildingException {
898    Range<Double> range = SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(value);
899
900    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ELEVATION, value, false);
901    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
902
903    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
904      assertEquals(String.format("elevation >= %s", range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue()), query);
905    } else if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
906      assertEquals(String.format("elevation <= %s", range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue()), query);
907    } else {
908      assertEquals(
909          String.format(
910              "((elevation >= %s) AND (elevation <= %s))",
911              range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue(), range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue()),
912          query);
913    }
914  }

928    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
929

931      assertEquals(String.format("year >= %s", range.lowerEndpoint().intValue()), query);
932    } else if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
933      assertEquals(String.format("year <= %s", range.upperEndpoint().intValue()), query);
934    } else {

938              range.lowerEndpoint().intValue(), range.upperEndpoint().intValue()),

942
943  @Test
944  public void testIssues() throws QueryBuildingException {
945    // EqualsPredicate
946    String query =
947        visitor.buildQuery(
948            new EqualsPredicate<>(
949                OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK", false));
950    assertEquals("stringArrayContains(issue,'TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK',true)", query);
951
952    // InPredicate
953    query =
954        visitor.buildQuery(
955            new InPredicate<>(
956                OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE,
957                List.of("TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK", "TAXON_MATCH_NONE"),
958                false));
959    assertEquals(
960        "(stringArrayContains(issue,'TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK',true) OR stringArrayContains(issue,'TAXON_MATCH_NONE',true))",
961        query);
962
963    // LikePredicate
964    try {
965      new LikePredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK", false);
966      fail();
967    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
968    }
969
970    // Not
971    query =
972        visitor.buildQuery(
973            new NotPredicate(
974                new EqualsPredicate<>(
975                    OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK", false)));
976    assertEquals("NOT stringArrayContains(issue,'TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK',true)", query);
977
978    // Not disjunction
979    query =
980        visitor.buildQuery(
981            new NotPredicate(
982                new DisjunctionPredicate(
983                    List.of(
984                        new EqualsPredicate<>(
985                            OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "COORDINATE_INVALID", false),
986                        new EqualsPredicate<>(
987                            OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE", false),
988                        new EqualsPredicate<>(
989                            OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "ZERO_COORDINATE", false),
990                        new EqualsPredicate<>(
991                            OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "RECORDED_DATE_INVALID", false)))));
992    assertEquals(
993        "NOT (stringArrayContains(issue,'COORDINATE_INVALID',true) OR stringArrayContains(issue,'COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE',true) OR stringArrayContains(issue,'ZERO_COORDINATE',true) OR stringArrayContains(issue,'RECORDED_DATE_INVALID',true))",
994        query);
995
996    // IsNotNull
997    query = visitor.buildQuery(new IsNotNullPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE));
998    assertEquals("(issue IS NOT NULL AND size(issue) > 0)", query);
999  }
1000
1001  @Test
1002  public void testAllParamsExist() {
1003    List<Predicate> predicates = new ArrayList<>();
1004    for (OccurrenceSearchParameter param : OccurrenceSearchParameter.values()) {
1005      String value = "7";
1006      if (OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOMETRY == param) {
1007        value = "POLYGON ((30 10, 10 20, 20 40, 40 40, 30 10))";
1008        predicates.add(new WithinPredicate(value));
1009      } else if (UUID.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1010        value = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
1011      } else if (Boolean.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1012        value = "true";
1013      } else if (Country.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1014        value = Country.GERMANY.getIso2LetterCode();
1015      } else if (Language.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1016        value = Language.GERMAN.getIso2LetterCode();
1017      } else if (Enum.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1018        Enum<?>[] values = ((Class<Enum>) param.type()).getEnumConstants();
1019        value = values[0].name();
1020      } else if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1021        value = "2014-01-23";
1022      } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1023        value = "2014-01-23,2015-05";
1024      } else if (OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEO_DISTANCE == param) {
1025        predicates.add(new GeoDistancePredicate("10", "20", "10km"));
1026      }
1027
1028      if (OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOMETRY != param
1029          && OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEO_DISTANCE != param) {
1030        predicates.add(new EqualsPredicate<>(param, value, false));
1031      }
1032    }
1033    ConjunctionPredicate and = new ConjunctionPredicate(predicates);
1034    try {
1035      visitor.buildQuery(and);
1036    } catch (QueryBuildingException e) {
1037      fail(e);
1038    }
1039  }
1040
1041  @Test
1042  public void testVocabularies() {
1043    Arrays.stream(OccurrenceSearchParameter.values())
1044        .filter(
1045            p ->
1046                Optional.ofNullable(visitor.term(p))
1047                    .map(SQLColumnsUtils::isVocabulary)
1048                    .orElse(false))
1049        .forEach(
1050            param -> {
1051              try {
1052                String hiveQueryField = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(visitor.term(param));
1053
1054                // EqualsPredicate
1055                String query = visitor.buildQuery(new EqualsPredicate<>(param, "value_1", false));
1056                assertEquals("stringArrayContains(" + hiveQueryField + ",'value_1',false)", query);
1057
1058                // InPredicate
1059                query =
1060                    visitor.buildQuery(
1061                        new InPredicate<>(param, List.of("value_1", "value_2"), false));
1062                assertEquals(
1063                    "(stringArrayContains("
1064                        + hiveQueryField
1065                        + ",'value_1',false) OR stringArrayContains("
1066                        + hiveQueryField
1067                        + ",'value_2',false))",
1068                    query);
1069
1070                // LikePredicate
1071                query = visitor.buildQuery(new LikePredicate<>(param, "value_*", false));
1072                assertEquals("lower(" + hiveQueryField + ") LIKE lower('value\\_%')", query);
1073
1074                // Not
1075                query =
1076                    visitor.buildQuery(
1077                        new NotPredicate(new EqualsPredicate<>(param, "value_1", false)));
1078                assertEquals(
1079                    "NOT stringArrayContains(" + hiveQueryField + ",'value_1',false)", query);
1080
1081                // IsNotNull
1082                query = visitor.buildQuery(new IsNotNullPredicate<>(param));
1083                assertEquals(
1084                    "(" + hiveQueryField + " IS NOT NULL AND size(" + hiveQueryField + ") > 0)",
1085                    query);
1086
1087                // IsNull
1088                query = visitor.buildQuery(new IsNullPredicate<>(param));
1089                if (visitor.isSQLArray(param)) {
1090                  assertEquals(
1091                      " (" + hiveQueryField + " IS NULL OR size(" + hiveQueryField + ") = 0) ",
1092                      query);
1093                } else {
1094                  assertEquals(hiveQueryField + " IS NULL", query);
1095                }
1096
1097              } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
1098                throw new RuntimeException(ex);
1099              }
1100            });
1101  }

1103  @Test
1104  public void testGreaterThanEqualsIncludingNull() {
1105    GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<OccurrenceSearchParameter> distanceFromCentroidPredicate =
1106        new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
1107            OccurrenceSearchParameter.DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS, "10");
1108    try {
1109      String query = visitor.buildQuery(distanceFromCentroidPredicate);
1110      assertEquals(
1111          "(distancefromcentroidinmeters >= 10 OR distancefromcentroidinmeters IS NULL)", query);
1112    } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
1113      fail();
1114    }
1115  }

1131  @Test
1132  public void testDisjunctionGreaterThanEqualsIncludingNull() {
1133    GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<OccurrenceSearchParameter> distanceFromCentroidPredicate =
1134        new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
1135            OccurrenceSearchParameter.DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS, "10");
1136    EqualsPredicate<OccurrenceSearchParameter> equalsPredicate =
1137        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "6", false);
1138    DisjunctionPredicate disjunctionPredicate =
1139        new DisjunctionPredicate(Arrays.asList(equalsPredicate, distanceFromCentroidPredicate));
1140    try {
1141      String query = visitor.buildQuery(disjunctionPredicate);
1142      assertEquals(
1143          "(((stringArrayContains(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], '6', true))) OR ((distancefromcentroidinmeters >= 10 OR distancefromcentroidinmeters IS NULL)))",
1144          query);
1145    } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
1146      fail();
1147    }
1148  }

1150  @Test
1151  public void testGeoTimePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
1152    Predicate predicate =
1153        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, "12", false);
1154    String query = visitor.buildQuery(predicate);
1155    assertEquals("12 > geologicaltime.gt AND 12 <= geologicaltime.lte", query);
1156
1157    Predicate rangePredicate =
1158        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, "12,15", false);
1159    query = visitor.buildQuery(rangePredicate);
1160    assertEquals("geologicaltime.gt >= 12.0 AND geologicaltime.lte <= 15.0", query);
1161
1162    rangePredicate =
1163        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, "12,*", false);
1164    query = visitor.buildQuery(rangePredicate);
1165    assertEquals("geologicaltime.gt >= 12.0", query);
1166
1167    rangePredicate =
1168        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, "*,15", false);
1169    query = visitor.buildQuery(rangePredicate);
1170    assertEquals("geologicaltime.lte <= 15.0", query);
1171  }

1307  @Test
1308  public void testHumboldtEventDuration() throws QueryBuildingException {
1309    Predicate p =
1310        new EqualsPredicate<>(
1311            EventSearchParameter.HUMBOLDT_EVENT_DURATION_VALUE_IN_MINUTES, "1", false);
1312    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
1313    assertEquals("h.humboldteventdurationvalueinminutes = 1", query);
1314
1315    p =
1316        new EqualsPredicate<>(
1317            EventSearchParameter.HUMBOLDT_EVENT_DURATION_VALUE_IN_MINUTES, "1,3", false);
1318    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
1319    assertEquals(
1320        "((h.humboldteventdurationvalueinminutes >= 1.0) AND (h.humboldteventdurationvalueinminutes <= 3.0))",
1321        query);
1322
1323    p =
1324        new EqualsPredicate<>(
1325            EventSearchParameter.HUMBOLDT_EVENT_DURATION_VALUE_IN_MINUTES, "1,*", false);
1326    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
1327    assertEquals("h.humboldteventdurationvalueinminutes >= 1.0", query);
1328  }
